Vps_VpdmaMaxSizeParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » VPS - Common Data Types and macros

Capture Max Size information. More...

#include <vps_dataTypes.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 instId
 
UInt32 maxOutWidth [VPS_VPDMA_NUM_MAXSIZE_REG]
 
UInt32 maxOutHeight [VPS_VPDMA_NUM_MAXSIZE_REG]
 

Detailed Description

Capture Max Size information.

The Max Frame Logic has 8 possible settings for both width and height. The settings are 4 fixed constrained values which are for typical video standards, 3 programmable values and an unconstrained setting. The 3 programmable values are set in the max_size1, max_size2, max_size3 registers. The descriptor then selects one of the values to constrain the transmitted frame.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_VpdmaMaxSizeParams::instId

instId: Instance Id determines VIP1, VIP2, VIP3 or VPE is in use.

UInt32 Vps_VpdmaMaxSizeParams::maxOutHeight[VPS_VPDMA_NUM_MAXSIZE_REG]

maxHeight: Maximum Height of the frame/field that shall be transmitted to the external buffer. If the captured height received exceeds this then only maxHeight number of lines is transmitted to the external buffer.

UInt32 Vps_VpdmaMaxSizeParams::maxOutWidth[VPS_VPDMA_NUM_MAXSIZE_REG]

maxWidth: Maximum Width of the frame/field that shall be transmitted to the external buffer. If the captured width received exceeds this then only maxWidth number of pixels per line is transmitted to the external buffer.
